text: A file, which can't be shown because your team is past the free storage limit, was commented on.
Hello! I see the design manager is getting new updates, great to see! I have a question on upgrading modules. Do we have a resource that can explain what the upgrades are doing? Thanks,

Noticing some unexpected behavior with DM2 fields. Basically, I am using a CTA field and I am checking whether or not a CTA has been selected. Before any CTA has been selected (field has no set default), `{{ module.cta_field is undefined }}` and `{{ module.cta_field is none }}` both return `true`, which is what I would expect. However, when a CTA is added and then removed, both return `false`. The only thing I can get to return true is `{{ module.cta_field == "null" }}`. I would expect `{{ module.cta_field is none }}` to return true in this scenario, but it looks like it swaps the cta guid string for the string “null” instead of setting it as an actual null value
:wave: Hey <@U26H0JQ05>! I reported this issue with the DM team
